title: First Ride: The New Giant TCR Advanced SL Is a Love Letter to Taiwan Road Cycling
content:
The latest TCR race road bike weighs as little as 6.4 kg complete. We head to Taiwan to figure out what it's about.

Read the full article at First Ride: The New Giant TCR Advanced SL Is a Love Letter to Taiwan Road Cycling on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
